comment.text: This translation key is used to display a button label in a filter component that clears all filters. It appears as a link within a filter control element. Translators should provide an alternative text that conveys the action of clearing all filters.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Hamısını silin" while literally meaning "Delete all", is not the best equivalent for "Clear all." "Clear all" implies removing selections or resetting a state, not necessarily deletion. "Silin" strongly implies deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Hamlını təmizlə" (Remove all) or "Hamlını boşalt" (Empty all) depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Изчистване на всичко' (Izchistvane na vsichko) literally translates to 'Cleaning of everything'. While it conveys a similar concept, 'Clear all' implies more of a removal or deletion, not just cleaning. A more accurate translation would convey this action.

While "Εκκαθάριση όλων" is a literal translation of "Clear all", it's not the most natural or commonly used phrasing in Greek. It sounds quite formal and perhaps a bit technical. "Clear all" often implies a quick, simple action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Διαγραφή όλων" (Delete all), "Καθαρισμός όλων" (Clean all - though this has slightly different connotations), or simply "Όλα" (All) if the context allows.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Մաքրել բոլորը" (Makrel bolory) is a literal translation of "Clear all", it doesn't convey the intended meaning effectively in Armenian. It sounds awkward and not idiomatic. 'Clear all' often implies deleting or removing all items.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Ջնջել բոլորը" (Jgnjel bolory) which translates to "Delete all" or "Արձակել բոլորը" (Ardakel bolory) which could mean 'Release all', depending on the specific context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "すべてクリア" (subete kuriia) is understandable, it's a more literal translation of 'Clear all' and doesn't convey the precise nuance. 'Clear all' often implies a reset or removal of all items/progress. A more accurate translation might depend on the context, but options like 'すべて削除' (subete sakujo - delete all) or 'すべてリセット' (subete risetto - reset all) could be more appropriate depending on the specific action being performed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternative translations like 'すべて削除' or 'すべてリセット', depending on the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Golire totală" translates to 'Total emptying' or 'Complete emptying', which isn't the most natural or accurate rendering of "Clear all". A more suitable translation would convey the meaning of 'erase' or 'delete all'.

While 'සියල්ල හිස් කරන්න' is understandable, a more accurate and natural translation of "Clear all" would be something like "සියල්ල ඉවත් කරන්න" (siyalla ival karna). " හිස් කරන්න" implies emptying, which isn't always the intended meaning of 'Clear all'.

While "Обриши све" is understandable, a more precise translation of 'Clear all' in a user interface context would be something like 'Избриши све' (Izbriši sve). 'Обриши' (Obriši) implies wiping or erasing with a cloth, whereas 'Избриши' directly translates to 'delete'.
